TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi DispatcherFrame extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

summary.span: 表示 中的执行循环。

span.span: Represents an execution loop in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象通常分为两类： objects typically fall into two categories: - 退出仅指示时的长时间运行、 常规用途帧。Long running, general purpose frames that exit only when instructed to. 这些帧应在用户请求时退出。These frames should exit when they are requested. - 短时间运行的非常具体的帧该退出时满足一项重要标准。Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. 考虑这些帧可能不以退出时在要求退出等待需满足其退出条件。These frames may consider not to exit when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. 这些帧应该具有与它们关联的超时。These frames should have a time-out associated with them. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 不能将在此托管的类[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot use this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用达到类似结果作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]方法。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool exitWhenRequested) cil managed

param.name: exitWhenRequested
param.span: 指示在要求退出所有帧时是否将退出此帧。

span.span: Indicates whether this frame will exit when all frames are requested to exit.

summary.span: 使用指定的退出请求标志初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, by using the specified exit request flag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常分为两类： typically fall into two categories: - 长时间运行、 常规用途帧，退出仅指示时。Long running, general purpose frames, that exit only when instructed to. 这些帧应在用户请求时退出。These frames should exit when they are requested. - 短时间运行的非常具体的帧该退出时满足一项重要标准。Short running, very specific frames that exit when an important criteria is met. 这些帧可以考虑在要求退出等待其退出条件得以满足时并不退出。These frames may consider not exiting when they are requested in favor of waiting for their exit criteria to be met. 这些帧应该具有与它们关联的超时。These frames should have a time-out associated with them. - - 在应用程序关闭所有框架都都请求退出。At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Continue { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 是否应该继续。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this should continue.

value.span: 如果此帧应该继续，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the frame should continue; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将查询在每个调度程序循环的顶部。 is queried at the top of each dispatcher loop. 在应用程序关闭所有框架都都请求退出。At application shutdown, all frames are request to exit. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类的成员通常不是使用在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或不能在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Members of this class are either not typically used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or cannot be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用达到类似结果作为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]方法。The following example shows how to use a to achieve similar results as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] method. [!code-csharp[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)] [!code-vb[dispatchersnippets#DispatcherDispatcherFrameDoEvents](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DispatcherSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dispatcherdispatcherframedoevents)]
